subject: Web3
title: The Unbanked Opportunity
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Unbanked Opportunity.

hook.text: Nearly two billion adults worldwide have no bank account. DeFi only needs a smartphone and internet.

buildup.text: In many countries, opening a bank account requires documents, minimum balances, and physical branches.

discovery.text: DeFi removes these barriers. Anyone with a phone can lend, borrow, and earn interest without permission.

twist.text: In practice, DeFi is complex, English-dominated, and requires crypto literacy. The unbanked aren't the main users.

climax.text: The promise is real but unfulfilled. Simpler interfaces and local languages could unlock DeFi for billions.

punchline.text: DeFi could bank the unbanked. It just hasn't yet.

quiz.question: Why hasn't DeFi reached most unbanked populations yet?
options: DeFi is complex, English-dominated, and requires crypto literacy
